response.overview: This is the story of a brave hero Viraj Bhatt who always does justice and opposes injustice. His amazing and wonderful heroin Mona Lisa who teases the hero every moment and forces him to fall in love with her. This film has everything that entertains you. You will see very naughty love, humour and little fight between both our hero and heroines. At the end you will see the fight between the hero and heroines with the villain. A lot of focus has been given to entertain the audience through all the songs of this movie so that you watch all the songs again and again.
response.title: Kasam Vardi Ki
